errors.regexError:
Regex Error: {0}

Pattern: "{1}"

Examples:
• .*\.tsx$ - TSX files
• ^test.*\.js$ - JS files starting with 'test'
• .*component.* - Files containing 'component'
errors.patternTooLong: Regex pattern is too long (must be within 1000 characters)
errors.dangerousPattern: This pattern cannot be used due to performance reasons
errors.duplicateFileName: A file with the same name already exists

searchPattern.label: Search Pattern (Regex)
searchPattern.helpText: Search will be executed automatically when you type

includeFolders.helpText: Leave blank to search all folders
